body: Albeiro Rodas interviewed Nora Isabel Saldarriaga, the director of "Forjando Futuros" (Shaping Futures), "a Colombian NGO with different projects, but only one ideal: to stay at the side of vulnerable people like the victims of the armed conflict."
original_body: Albeiro Rodas interviewed Nora Isabel Saldarriaga, the director of "Forjando Futuros" (Shaping Futures), "a Colombian NGO with different projects, but only one ideal: to stay at the side of vulnerable people like the victims of the armed conflict."
title: Colombia: Interview with Director of NGO "Forjando Futuros" (Shaping Futures)
